p: Via PubMed and Google, we searched for IS special issues using the search terms "special issue” AND "implementation science.” All special issues related to IS in healthcare from 2000 until March 2020 were included. Additionally, we manually searched all journals listed in our survey and suggested by IS experts. Information on journal name, special issue title, volume (issue), publication or submission date, number of papers included in the special issue, the journal's impact factor and h-index, and country were extracted and presented in a table.
